title: Property & Casualty Insurance
html:
Home » Services » Insurance » Property & Casualty Insurance

Property & Casualty

You focus on people. We’ll handle the protection-powered confidence to keep your ministry safe and sound. Additionally, our AG Insurance Program with Church Mutual Insurance offers some nice extras for Assemblies of God churches.

Jump to the AG Program

Are you an insurance broker?*

Request a P&C quote.

Provide a few specifics, and we’ll contact you about a policy built specifically for your ministry.

AG Insurance Program

Discounted premiums. Exclusively for AG churches.
Expanded coverages. No extra charge.
Kingdom support. Your participation funds ministry.

The AG Insurance Program is offered in exclusive partnership with Church Mutual Insurance Company.

Through this program, we’re pleased to offer broader coverage, lower pricing, and other value-added services—all with the strength and experience of America’s leading church insurance provider.

Identifying and managing against risk

is a great idea for your church;
you might even say it’s brilliant.

You have been entrusted with providing a safe place for people to learn, worship, and minister. Risk management helps identify risks, implement smart policies, and obtain the right insurance coverage. Taking special precautions to minimize your risks and liabilities is important. Our church risk advisors know how to assist your church and ensure the continuity of your ministry. Contact us to learn more.

Access our extensive risk management resources at
agfinancial.org/risk-management.

Additional coverages available

› Sexual misconduct liability
› Pastoral/counseling professional liability
› Educator’s legal liability
› Directors, officers, and trustees liability
› Medical payments
› Umbrella liability
› Religious freedom legal defense

Extensive risk management resources

› On-site safety and hazard analysis
› Case management
› Worker and volunteer screening
› Water and temperature sensors
› Swimmer and allergy bands
› Ergonomic evaluations
› Online safety tools
› Comprehensive risk management guide

Your people & property. Safe & sound.
